metadata.dc:title: Autobiographical narrative of adolescents in crisis
metadata.dc:description: Adolescents with serious disorders tend to have a defective vision of their own autobiographical history, or one that is dominated by parasitic and pathogenic objects that are inserted into the construction of the private space of the self. When they are created, these constructions tend to take the shape of caricatures, and we can consider them to be similar to a defensive but unconscious false self. We will examine how to work effectively in these cases, locating the traumatic memories in the autobiographical account that prevent the patient from organizing his own history. These are explicit and implicit memories, unknown to him or her, but influential in the organization of the self (AU)
metadata.dc:creator: Nicolò, Anna Maria
Accetti, Laura
metadata.dc:description: El adolescente grave lleva consigo una historia autobiográfica o bien defectuosa o bien saturada de objetos parasitarios y patógenos que se introducen en la construcción de un espacio privado del self. Cuando se crean, estas construcciones tienden a configurarse como caricaturescas y podemos considerarlas similares a un falso self defensivo pero inconsciente. Examinaremos cómo trabajar eficazmente en estos casos, localizando en el relato autobiográfico los recuerdos traumáticos que impiden al paciente organizar su propia historia, recuerdos explícitos e implícitos, desconocidos para él, pero influyentes en la organización de su self (AU)
